mapper.sql: id, platform, market, platform_product_id, platform_sku_id, title, brand, category_id, category_path, listed_at, first_seen_at, last_seen_at, created_at, updated_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO market_product ( platform, market, platform_product_id, platform_sku_id, title, brand, category_id, category_path, listed_at, first_seen_at, last_seen_at, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{platform}, #{market}, #{platformProductId}, #{platformSkuId}, #{title}, #{brand}, #{categoryId}, #{categoryPath}, #{listedAt}, #{firstSeenAt}, #{lastSeenAt}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE market = VALUES(market), platform_sku_id = VALUES(platform_sku_id), title = VALUES(title), brand = VALUES(brand), category_id = VALUES(category_id), category_path = VALUES(category_path), listed_at = COALESCE(VALUES(listed_at), listed_at), first_seen_at = LEAST(IFNULL(first_seen_at, VALUES(first_seen_at)), VALUES(first_seen_at)), last_seen_at = VALUES(last_seen_at), updated_at = VALUES(updated_at)
